thread.title: BRIEF-Encompass Health And Saint Alphonsus Announce Joint Venture

title: BRIEF-Encompass Health And Saint Alphonsus Announce Joint Venture

organizations.name: brief-encompass health and saint alphonsus announce joint venture
brief-encompass health and saint alphonsus announce joint venture reuters

text:
21 PM / in 13 minutes BRIEF-Encompass Health And Saint Alphonsus Announce Joint Venture Reuters Staff 
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Encompass Health Corp: 
* ENCOMPASS HEALTH AND SAINT ALPHONSUS ANNOUNCE JOINT VENTURE TO PROVIDE SEAMLESS POST-ACUTE PATIENT CARE 
* ENCOMPASS HEALTH CORP - ‍CONSTRUCTION OF NEW HOSPITAL, ENCOMPASS HEALTH‘S FIRST IN STATE OF IDAHO, IS EXPECTED TO BEGIN IN 2018​ Source text for Eikon:
